channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I think I‚Äôm going to retire my ‚ÄúToronto name‚Äù since it feels like one of those things where, if I have to explain it, I‚Äôm probably embarrassed about it. https://t.co/H1qMB79n3D
I think I‚Äôm going to retire my ‚ÄúToronto name‚Äù since it‚Äôs one of those things that fees like if I have to explain it, I‚Äôm probably embarrassed about it. https://t.co/H1qMB79n3D
If it continues to not get any uptake, I‚Äôm going to retire @CanadaPlanner in about a year‚Äôs time.
@ReneeStephen @rtanglao Those were amazing and joyful times, back in the Web 2.0 days, when the web was, y‚Äôknow, good. (There were also bad parts, I want to recognize that.)
@rtanglao @ReneeStephen I‚Äôm sure! https://t.co/3qjl5aCDs1
@ReneeStephen @rtanglao There are photos of Roland and me where we are both in the frame, so I can prove that we are indeed two separate people.
The best floats at the Toronto Pride Parade are the mass transportation floats. https://t.co/xZ3XjqMDBf
@rtanglao I‚Äôm proud of your son for graduating (send him my congratulations!), and proud of your family for including you in the photos that way!
If someone asks you to take a photo of them, um, take a photo them. When‚Äôs the next time that‚Äôs going to happen?

My evening just opened up. Now what?
Is there a mindfulness meditation for when someone you‚Äôre about to meet up with cancels at the last minute?
Good thing this meetup wasn‚Äôt a last-ditch effort to meet new peop‚ÄìOh no.
@Stv Did you pay extra for that?
@MetroManTO @NotSafe4BikesTO üëÜüèªüëÜüèª #NotSafe4BikesTO
Same in Canada. https://t.co/2cHbkLvbPN
Do you take a photo of something hoping to remember it later? How has that worked out for you? Terribly for me.

There‚Äôve been a few recent tweets that I can‚Äôt stop thinking about.
I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this tweet. https://t.co/EJcrpKLJq2
I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this tweet. https://t.co/54E47ZCklj
I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this tweet. https://t.co/klDoV7l4u9
I can‚Äôt stop thinking about this tweet. https://t.co/jyzB0er0dH
The @alltartans account has been really good lately. Even better than usual.

Council should‚Äôve voted for the guy who said he would be a good steward and wanted to gain the experience of being a councillor. https://t.co/X5rushGMAu
I like the cut of this guy‚Äôs jib. https://t.co/3OgWk3Bi13
*Owen Wilson Wow* https://t.co/NZHQ4Q00GH
Have any of the councillors who voted to appoint the candidate for council, who posted anti-LGBTQ and anti-Islam content on her Facebook page, without doing any vetting resigned yet?

Halfway through the year, and I‚Äôm well on my way to listening to more music than I did in 2007. Buying good wireless headphones in April had a lot to do with that. https://t.co/tS1ghc2aWw
For a while I was listening to albums‚Ä¶ https://t.co/R8JCwVCfEi
‚Ä¶and then I started to listen to an artist‚Äôs entire discography, in chronological order if possible (sometimes all of their albums aren‚Äôt online, or I can‚Äôt wait to listen to a certain album)‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶and now I‚Äôm more and more listening to playlists, usually shuffled.
I‚Äôm really digging this playlist. https://t.co/HPyLsA2jPM

The thought of owning a cowboy shirt again occurred to me other day, and I haven‚Äôt been able to shake it since.
Also, a Hawaiian shirt.
I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôm doing tonight.

Can I get more certainty on when the 7th wave will hit? I‚Äôd like to know when to not tell my crushes I‚Äôm in love with them. True, it‚Äôs never, but I‚Äôd still like that phase of the pandemic in my calendar. https://t.co/9DI7ydTdGS
@beanjammin Probably, yes.
That makes two people who will not run for the leadership of the UCP. Who else will join us in not running? https://t.co/TEpkgY7gSr
@ChristianPeel @alexkli @gruber https://t.co/gmqESBYXtw
@TimeOutTravel Jupiter: ‚ÄúFor now.‚Äù
